name: Extreme Car Driver 2017- 4x4 Offroad Simulator
description:
Get ready for the thrilling offroad car driving experience very different from revved driving 4x4 suv jeep and heavy machinery 6x6 trucks. In this offroad drive discover a crashed police copter site, camping site ruins and clan of wolves. No 2x2 road lanes, just extremely narrow roads with hill climb. Drive ahead quickly without hitting the boars and falling into the trench. Finish the course as fast as possible. Do not accelerate while cornering. Test your extreme driving skills in this new legendary offroading game 2017.
Features of Extreme Car Driving Offroad:
- Realistic offroad Driving simulator with high quality 4x4 vehicles
- Choose from a wide variety of high speed sportscar.
- This exciting and dynamic off-road game is sure to bring you hours of fun.
- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains and forests
- Choose most convenient camera angle for driving.
- With auto physics 3 car driving modes (touch, steering and tilt controls)
- Adjust the quality button to play without lag
- Play freely with no tension of huge city traffic.

TIPS:
• Do not Crash
• Do not get off the track
• Collect all flags to complete level

Fasten your seatbelts, get off the road, it's gonna be a tough ride!
